title: A treatise of true fortitude. By M. George Gyffard, Preacher of the worde of God, at Maldon in Essex
author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.
publisher: Printed [by J. Roberts] for Iohn Hardie, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Tygars head,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
